taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Polygonaceae;subfamily Eriogonoideae;genus Eriogonum;species douglasii;variety douglasii;

bio:treatment.discussion: Variety douglasii is widespread in scattered, disjunct populations in southeastern Washington (Columbia, Douglas, Ferry, Kittitas, Klickitat, and Yakima counties) and northeastern Oregon (Baker, Gilliam, Grant, Jefferson, Malheur, Sherman, Union, Wallowa, and Wasco counties).
